welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Formello, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. Get ready to immerse yourself in its charm and indulge in its delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Formello has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, dedicated to long-haul international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ciampino Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
